entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • propagate empty check to foreach enumeration over Span? #93708
  • Use the `-S` and `-B` Options on the CMake Command Line to Specify Source and Build Directories Instead of Moving with `pushd` #93702
    9.0.0
  • `assembly.GetTypes()` now includes System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes #93699
  • Constant vectors propagated incorrectly #93698
  • [wasm] The way of getting the path of `runtimeconfig.json` file is not always reliable #93692
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] dotnet.native.wasm was re-generated because the list of .o files in emcc-link.rsp is non-deterministic #93689
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Deadlock on mono_loader_lock in mono_class_create_from_typedef #93686
    9.0.0
  • Fatal runtime errors do not always generate crashes/Watson reports #93682
  • JIT: Consider adjusting preferencing of cold intervals related to hot intervals in LSRA #93681
    Future
  • [WASM] driver.c got recompiled due to the order of methods changed #93680
    9.0.0
  • Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/loader.c:1638, condition `id <= GPOINTER_TO_UINT (*data)' not met #93687
  • Unexpected exception type from X509Certificate2 .ctor #93676
  • [wasm] Runtime tests failing - `_Vector2_3_4::Vector2_3_4Test.RunVector*Tests` because of missing support for native libraries #93669
  • crossgen2 error due to .NET 8 dependency in source build #93666
  • GC Question: should we consider using `GC.Collect` in the library #93656
  • Trying to save application settings crashes the application. #93671
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetTotalAllocatedBytes\\GetTotalAllocatedBytes.cmd #93641
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988.cmd #93640
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #93639
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Idea for a convenient Replace #93637

Closed

  • Unsafe.As breaks callvirt after inlining in .NET 8 RC2 #93650
  • Parallel.ForAsync memory leak when used with a CancellationToken #93664
    8.0.0
  • Configuration Binder turns IList<T> into Array<T> #93601
    7.0.x
  • System.Runtime.Tests assembly crashing with mono runtime and xunit 2.5.1 #93597
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT .cpp files. #93683
  • [7.0][mono][arm64] futex-internal.h: No such file or directory - futex_wait_cancelable native crash in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn3.11.Tests #87444
    7.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Swizzling operators for Vector[2,3,4] similar to HLSL #93609
  • ConfigurationBinder.Get<T> incorrect nullability of return value #93668
  • Hot reload - EnC: we do not support patching of existing PARAM table cols. token=0x08000d0e #93149
    7.0.x
  • [browser][WBT] SatelliteLoadingTests.LoadSatelliteAssembly - ActiveIssue #93387
    9.0.0
  • Migrating from ComImport COM interfaces/classes to the new GeneratedComInterface/class #93667
  • Incorrect value in FirstDayOfWeek test #93354
  • RequestDuration_EnrichmentHandler_Success_Recorded fails with System.Net.Quic.QuicException : Stream aborted by peer #93250
    8.0.0
  • wasm perf pipeline shouldn't run for markdown only changes #93598
  • 8.0.0-rc.1 Library not loaded: /System/Library/Frameworks/CryptoKit.framework/Versions/A/CryptoKit #93167
    Future
  • Proposal: Stream.HasLength property #43448
    Future
  • Reading file on an Kubernetes NFS volume with dotnet 6 application freezes thread #93227
  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated does not achieve TokenAccessLevels.Impersonate #93644
  • [HTTP/3] H3_FRAME_UNEXPECTED in stress tests #87559
    9.0.0
  • HttpStress, HTTP/3: content mismatch in POST Duplex Slow #76183
    9.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #93643
  • Add Azure Pipelines build definition that can be customized via UI #12413
    Future
  • [wasi] wasm trap: out of bounds memory access in sgen_gray_object_queue_trim_free_list #88501
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT tests failing because of missing test app output #93583
  • Feature request: Native stacks for EventPipe/LTTNG #12408
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #93707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #93706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: remove simple lowering #93704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] JIT: remove incorrect type deduction for an Unsafe.As case #93703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #93697
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasm] Fix blazor startup measurements #93696
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Use the improved vectorization algorithm for aggregate TensorPrimitives operations #93695
    area-System.Numerics
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to build with tfm=net9.0 #93693
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] perf: Copy targeting pack nuget also for perf pipeline #93688
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Replaced CMake's Repeated CONFIG Expressions With Their Condensed Counterparts #93678
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix Vector128 SIMD fmin and fmax #93677
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] NaN-box float arguments #93665
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #93662
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Fix: OID's cache poisoning with random values #93661
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData package readme #93660
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Disable FastTailCall in case of split arg #93655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove RequiresProcessIsolation from some loader tests #93654
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Provide Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions package readme #93653
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [browser] streamline Task/Promise marshalling - atttemp 2 #93648
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix: unmanaged memory leak on parsing ill-formed certificates #93647
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add native AOT cross build docs #93638
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [mono] Disallow casts of bounded arrays to array special interfaces #93617
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Revert "Workaround a C++/CLI bug involving DIMs (#89253)" #93679
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Set bbJumpKind and bbJumpDest during block initialization #93415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.14 #93691
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.25 #93690
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper blocks until simple lower #93371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: remove incorrect type deduction for an Unsafe.As case #93694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure Parallel.ForAsync unregisters from CancellationToken #93672
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Provide Microsoft.Extensions.Options.DataAnnotations package readme #93657
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Zlib: Update zlib to v1.2.13, intel-zlib to v1.2.13_jtk; add memory protections #93634
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression
  • [mono] Disallow casts of bounded arrays to array special interfaces #93616
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Revert "Workaround a C++/CLI bug involving DIMs (#89253)" #92234
    area-System.Numerics, 8.0.0
  • Update README.md #93675
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Ensure Parallel.ForAsync unregisters from CancellationToken #93674
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading
  • Only write cmake_cmd_line.txt cache file if cmake succeeded #93673
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix analyzer treatment of flow captures of arrays #93420
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Fix build of IJW test after VS upgrade #93649
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix runtime tests build on CI #93646
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix target_link_options in pgosupport.cmake #93670
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #93355
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix CodeGen::instGen_Set_Reg_To_Imm #93411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Fix incorrect value in `FirstDayOfWeek` test #93595
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Address PR feedback from #93540 #93645
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete unused PalTerminateCurrentProcess #93633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Provide System.IO.Hashing package readme #93567
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing
  • [wasm] Use the KnownFrameworkReference update to change the targeting pack #93625
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve literal-after-loop regex optimization #93190
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [mono][amd64] Pass and return SIMD values in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Vectorizes IndexOfMin/Max/Magnitude #93469
    area-System.Numerics
  • Implement API AppendAllBytes 84532 #93519
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Implement the OleVariant struct, the OleVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use locally built ILLink.Tasks with WBT #93629
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Handle MultiRegNode in gtGetRegMask() #93576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator TryFindNextStartingPosition #88400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Enable cgroups hierarchical memory limits support #93611
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization Get available locales #93594
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Consider atomics throwing #93610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][jit] Partially implemented logical immediates on arm64 #93606
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [DRAFT][mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix binding types with optional string parameters #93563
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • reuse existing resource file #93539
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Improved imm64 for negative numbers #93602
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • wasm runtime tests debug #93365
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Provide System.Memory.Data package readme #93516
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: make bbID available in release, use it for pred list ordering #93636
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fixing createdump for RISC-V #93374
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [macOS][dotnet] TwitchDownloaderCLI generates corrupt files when saving to exFAT volumes #36220
  • SDK needs newer version of format #36219
  • TwitchDownloaderCLI.exe crashes when saving to APFS volume on Windows #36218
  • Revert minimum msbuild changes that were checked in to unblock 8.0.1xx codeflow #36216
  • Dotnet run breaks when AssemblyName ends on Service #36201
  • `nuget.config` is ending up in my output directory #36198

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ASP.NET SDK test baseline generation when repo is part of a git worktree #36240
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #36238
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #36237
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #36236
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #36235
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #36234
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36233
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36217
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.404 #36228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.311 #36227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.114 #36226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.125 #36223
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.417 #36225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.320 #36224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Define a default set of hot reload capabilities for Blazor WebAssembly #36195
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch
  • Replace explicit richCodeNavigationEnvironment in .vsts-ci-richnav.yml #36200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36189
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add --no-http-cache option #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip workload integrity check on Linux and non-sudo #36123
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608

PullRequests

Updated

  • replace speclet terms with ECMA standard terms #7606

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn LSIF generator should support optional sharding mode #70438
  • Constant folding doesn't work correctly sometimes #70437
  • Search for instances of Primary Constructor usage #70436
  • BC40003 code fix should offer both 'Overloads' and 'Shadows' #70434
  • Unable to run tests #70431
  • New feature: disable autofix for specific rules in .editorConfig #70428

Closed

  • `u8` should be colorized just like a string #70439
  • Diagnostic tags don't follow LSP spec #70426
  • EnC: Custom attribute deltas are emitted incorrectly #70357
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34218.35 #70430
  • Feature Semantic Classification is not available #70429

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent StringBuilder resizes during SyntaxNode.GetText #70447
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure the VSCode server process runs on non-preview runtime #70446
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update some logging in the project system #70445
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix TriggerOnTyping to not block explicit invoking completion #70444
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update config file after 17.9 branch is created #70442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Clear rca2 #70433
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle missing ISimplificationService implementation for non-C#/VB languages #70425
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged
  • Revert "Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process"" #70424
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add logging to LSP completion handler #70422
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Refactor how Extract Method returns results. #70443
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Slight improvement to refactoring preview performance for InlineTemporaryCodeRefactoringProvider #70440
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix classification layering #70416
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70441
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Minor cleanup in extract-method code. #70432
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update breaking change docs #70435
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix emitting Custom Attribute deltas #70350
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70427
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #70408
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70421
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next

Updated

  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.9
  • Validate diagnostic ID in Experimental attribute #70397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Apply NotNullIfNotNull postcondition on by-value parameters #70414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <expr>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<expr>)` for a side-effectless `<expr>` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Allow invisible editor support to handle open aspx files. #70396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update ExternalAccess for EditorConfig #70415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add async operation listener to allow integration tests to wait for server side operations #70359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use a simple diagnostic identifier to dedupe diagnostics #70410
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Clear 'run code analysis' results when a build completes #70412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: spread elements are not expressions #70417
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve completion in the context of pattern expressions #70262
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Bump MSBuild.StructuredLogger package version #70157
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] `NavigationManager.Refresh()` fails during static server rendering if server interactivity is enabled #51482
  • F# discriminated union custom converter isn't used. #51481
  • Blazor style guide for using of leading @ when specifying a component render mode #51480
  • Blazor Identity with Global RenderMode #51476
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #51475
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51474
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #51473
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51472
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #51471
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51470
  • Perf improvement: mvc #51469
  • Unsure how to inject HttpClient for InteractiveAuto render mode (RC2) #51468
  • Several issues with Kestrel header processing. #51467
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a disposed object (IServiceProvider) #51460
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, single_query, updates #51458
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates, updates #51457

Closed

  • IDX40001: Issuer: 'https://tenantname.b2clogin.com/tenantId/v2.0/', does not match any of the valid issuers provided for this application. #51005
    8.0.0
  • [NETSDKE2E] Alpine Only, with .NET 8.0 RTM warning: Failed to read or parse localization file when creating new project for the first time. #51198
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #51431
  • Content-Length mismatch randomly on high throughput when using Output Caching #51009
    8.0.0
  • There is an error "Exception while reading WASM runtime capabilities: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined " when dotnet watch Blazor WASM app after installing .NET 8.0-rtm at first time #51208
    8.0.0
  • Hot reload changes not applied for WebAssembly-rendered pages in Blazor Web app #50765
    8.0.0
  • Update Third Party Notices if needed #48727
    8.0.0
  • Is {PARAMETER NAME}Expression API in blazor data binding internal only? #51444
  • InputRadio didn't accept "checked" attribute #51451
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo makes a GET request when navigating between server interactive pages. #51465
  • Streaming rendering incompatible with certain hosting environments? #50915
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Model for referencing a component from another component - declaratively #51340
  • Blazor The trust relationship between the primary domain and the trusted domain failed with custom ServerAuthenticationStateProvider class. #51350
  • [Blazor .Net 8 RC2] Not able to register services in Wasm client project #51432
  • `CreatedResult` should accept null location #39454
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #51459
  • Asp.Net Core API controller memory leak repopend #45098 #48641
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51448
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51449
  • An exception occurs when running an app using BlazorWebView on a machine different from the one on which it was built. #51409
  • Static routes as string parameters for better SSR (enhancement nav) experience. #51263

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.14 #51479
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.25 #51478
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update Weather.razor to simplify [StreamRendering] attribute usage. #51477
    area-mvc
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Remove network.protocol.name from request duration metric #51456
    Servicing-approved, area-hosting, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [main] Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51348
    area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • Update the Microsoft.IdentityModel.* and Microsoft.Identity.Web.* packages to the latest patch release (7.0.3 & 2.15.2) #51430
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-auth, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51137

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException when resuming the App from an Android Autofill Service #18121
  • Maui.essentials 7.096 incompatible with Android GooglePlayServices Nugets like recaptcha #18118
  • Something isn't working #18116
  • Duplicate file errors not on all the Maui* things #18115
    Backlog
  • [Mac Catalyst] Setting MaximumTrackColor on Slider has no effect when using Mac Idiom #18111
    Backlog
  • [Mac Catalyst] Setting CancelButtonColor on SearchBar has no effect when using Mac Idiom #18110
    Backlog
  • CarouselView with Border flickers #18104
  • .Net8 Regression - Button background does not override implicit visualstate style #18103
    .NET 8 GA
  • Padding or Margin on FlexLayout #18102
  • [Windows] How to style the ScrollBar of the ScrollView #18101
  • The font size of a label with formattedtext is not the same as the fontsize of a label with regular text #18098
    Backlog
  • When debugging on the Android emulator, the thread occasionally interrupts, causing the app to crash. This issue can be consistently reproduced.安卓模拟器调试时线程有时会中断，app闪退，稳定复现 #18097
  • TabbedPage: Child Content overlapping Tabbed Page Menu #18096
    .NET 8 GA
  • CheckBox does not support ControlTemplates #18094
    Backlog
  • Entry bug—height grows on every input event #18092
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button CornerRadius is not working with BackgroundColor #18090
    Backlog

Closed

  • MAUI Blazor RC2 breaks <script src="foo.js"> type tag includes within body of .razor files #18065
    .NET 8 GA
  • Document issues with using ValueConverter in CollectionView #11975
    Backlog
  • Application crash when restoring multiple windows on Mac Catalyst #18093
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #18072
  • .NET MAUI App option doesn't appear on create project #18089
  • New Bug in .NET 8: GetVisualTreeElements(point) is now broken and won't run at all, says "MauiContext should have been set on parent." #18070

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Fixes window blinking when resizing #18120
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Fix 17210 #18119
    community ✨
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Set Nullable=enable in Control Samples projects #18114
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Rework the Label mappers for FormattedText #18105
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [tests] Enable Parallel tests back #18099
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Update Blazor Hybrid template to match ASP.NET Core Blazor Web template #18113
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] [net8.0] Reverting default item and globbing updates #18112
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Update with correct net7 version #18100
    .NET 8 GA
  • [ci] Dependabot should only use nuget.org #18109
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Revert "Run template tests run in parallel to save 15min of run time" #18077
    area/templates 📄

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
